name: PT Hijup.com
description: Operator of an online fashion and lifestyle e-commerce platform designed to serve Muslim women. The company's platform offers a wide range of products including square hijab, scarf caps, long dresses, blazers and skirts as well as accessories such as masks, brooches, socks and necklaces.
one_liner: Operator of an online fashion and lifestyle e-commerce platform designed to serve Muslim women. The company's platform offers a wide range of products including square hijab, scarf caps, long dresses, blazers and skirts as well as accessories such as masks, brooches, socks and necklaces.
